name: Snow Drift (itch)
description:
Snow Drift - KinoCreatesGames

A short experimental game using mode 7 about drifting in the snow.
If your snow meter hits max it's game over.
Stay on the track or be stuck forever! 

Good luck!

Made in 7 days for the Haxe Winter Game Jam!

Controls:

W - Accelerate
AD - Turn left/Right
Enter - Initiate a drift
Pause - Escape Button
To Navigate Out of the credits, hit escape

Credits Game Design & Coding
